title: Anniversary skins?
body:
Any ideas on a skin to celebrate how long you have been playing this game? i.e  A 5 year skin on an active account?
Or maybe a skin for the amount of hours you have committed to this game?
i Apoloigise in advance if this has already been brought up etc.

Any other opinions on this?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ThatsBS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VF7LEVE4,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-16T08:22:35.276+0000)
>
> Any ideas on a skin to celebrate how long you have been playing this game? i.e  A 5 year skin on an active account?
> Or maybe a skin for the amount of hours you have committed to this game?
> i Apoloigise in advance if this has already been brought up etc.
> 
> Any other opinions on this?

Actually sounds pretty neat but I feel like people who don't qualify for the skin would complain. Similar to how people feel about the Victorious skins and other legacy skins but still dounds pretty cool.
